extensionDescription.message: Provides ability to manage multiple tabs at a time.

bookmarkTabs.notification.message.message: $COUNT$ tabs including "$TITLE$" are bookmarked in a new folder under "$PARENT$.

panelCaptionBottom.message: And Click Here to Choose Action

panelDisabledBy.treestyletab.message: Select and Do panel is disabled, instead please see vertical tab bar in the sidebar provided by Tree Style Tab. You can select tabs by dragging (you need to start the drag action with a long press over 0.5sec). Moreover, Ctrl-Click toggles selection and Shift-Click selects tabs between the clicked and the active.

message.updatedFromLegacy.description.message: Multiple Tab Handler is now reborn based on WebExtensions technologies for Firefox 57 and later. Now you can select tabs and do something command from the "Select and Do" toolbar button. Moreover, this addon is compatible to Tree Style Tab another addon. You'll select tabs in in the TST's sidebar, by long-press (about 0.5sec).

config.copyToClipboardFormats.placeholde.message:
Available place holders for formats:
%URL%=Page URL,
%TITLE%=Page Title,
%AUTHOR%=Author name (specified by META),
%DESCRIPTION%=Description (specified by META),
%KEYWORDS%=Search keywords (specified by META),
%URL_HTMLIFIED%=URL escaped for HTML,
%TITLE_HTMLIFIED%=Title escaped for HTML,
%AUTHOR_HTMLIFIED%=Author name escaped for HTML,
%DESCRIPTION_HTMLIFIED%=Description escaped for HTML,
%KEYWORDS_HTMLIFIED%=Search keywords escaped for HTML,
%TAB%=Tab,
%EOL%=Line Feed,
%RT%=Copy as a rich text (Note: this placeholder itself is cleared from the copied text)

config.saveTabsPrefix.description.message: *Path under the download folder. "/" will be recognized as a path delimiter.

config.disablePanelWhenAlternativeTabBar.message: Disable panel when any alternative tab bar is available
